Changelog
=========

0.1 (09-03-10)
-------------------

- Initial release

0.2 (09-03-10)
-------------------

- Removed whitespace from code WoW Lich King -> WoWLichKing as this broke the code

0.3 (09-03-10)
-------------------

- Modified footer, added animated "banner" with jquery and spritely

0.4 (09-06-10)
-------------------

- Using plone built-in jQuery instead of an extern one
  -> deleted ++resource++collective.wowlichking.scripts/jquery-1.3.2.min.js
- Moved css from footer-template to main.css
